dao.name: QRY_PIC_PATH
dao.statement: select pic_PATH into :ls_pic_path from wrs_normal_pic where sys_cod = 'HFD' and athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and room_cod = :room_cod and begin_dat = to_date(:begin_dat, 'YYYY/MM/DD')

dao.name: CHK_WRS_NORMAL_PIC_IS_EXIST_BY_ROOM_COD
dao.statement: select count(*) as pic_count from wrs_normal_pic where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and trim(room_cod) = trim(:room_cod)
